name: os::unix::net::ancillary::AncillaryData::<'a>::try_from_cmsghdr

core::ptr::mut_ptr::<impl *mut T>::cast.doc: Casts to a pointer of another type.

os::unix::net::ancillary::AncillaryData:.doc:
Creates an `AncillaryData::ScmCredentials` variant.

 # Safety

 `data` must contain a valid control message and the control message must be type of
 `SOL_SOCKET` and level of `SCM_CREDENTIALS` or `SCM_CREDS`.

Creates an `AncillaryData::ScmRights` variant.

 # Safety

 `data` must contain a valid control message and the control message must be type of
 `SOL_SOCKET` and level of `SCM_RIGHTS`.
